title: im level 11 but it wont let me do certain things on the boards because it says im not level 5
body: im not sure whats going on here

replies.body: Sometimes an account needs to sync with the boards, especially if you're posting for the first time.  It looks like posting here has updated and you're all set.  Let me know if you still have issues posting!

Your level updates shortly after posting. It seems your level has already been updated by now, so you should be able to post and vote on the other boards that require you to be level 7 now :3

Please familiarize yourself with the [Universal Rules](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/4LgZ2EwM-universal-rules) and individual board guidelines before posting. Enjoy!
